content: step sew in ends and block measure the garment when placed flat while it is still wet this will allow you to pull it a bit to adjust if you need to make sure not to stretch the hood rib to much measurements c a b final measurements after blocking a= 23 cm b= 29 cm c= 52 cm a big thank you to my test knitters who as always have been awesome and helped me refine the pattern photocredto jessica harvigsson feel free to share your progress on instagram @notorious_knitterand #notorious_knitter #thenotoriouscowl 7 © elida virack 2022 all rights reserved this pattern is for personal use only it may not be copied resold or distributed to systematically sell garments made with this pattern is not allowed i
